entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 03:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
